required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of CAR-T Cells Targeting GPRC5D in the Treatment of r/r Multiple Myeloma
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Arm, Open Label Clinical Study of CAR-T Cells Targeting GPRC5D in the Treatment of Relapsed / Refractory Multiple Myeloma

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-arm, open-label, dose-escalation study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, cellular kinetics and initial efficacy of CAR-T cell therapy targeting GPRC5D in multiple myeloma subjects who have failed the standard treatments.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of initial treatment to Day 28 post GPRC5D CAR-T infusion.
From admission to the end of the follow-up, up to 2 years
primary_outcome.description: Adverse event and serious adverse event

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From admission to the end of the follow-up, up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: In peripheral blood and bone marrow

secondary_outcome.time_frame: In 3 months of GPRC5D CAR-T cell infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects with complete or partial remission

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 28 GPRC5D CAR-T infusion up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of patients with remission and stable disease after treatment in the total evaluable cases.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 24 months post GPRC5D CAR-T cells infusion
secondary_outcome.description: The time from the first assessment of remission or partial remission of the tumor to the first assessment of disease progression or death from any cause;
The time from cell reinfusion to the first assessment of tumor progression or death from any cause

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From GPRC5D CAR-T infusion to death，up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: The time from the cell reinfusion to death due to any cause.

arm_group.description: This is a open label, single arm clinical trial.

intervention.description: After enrollment, subjects complete the PBMC apheresis, then complete the Lymphocyte clearance, and then receive the dose climbing test: 1×10e6/kg，3×10e6/kg，6×10e6/kg.

facility.name: The first affiliated hospital of medical college of zhejiang university
